message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.ET, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the security challenges in IoT and proposes a novel secret key generation method using Physical Unclonable Functions (PUFs) for device authentication. The paper focuses on the use of ReRAM-based ternary-state PUFs and proposes a fuzzy extractor structure using serially concatenated BCH-Polar codes. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.ET (Embedded Systems), and cs.LG (Machine Learning).
